Create a gratitude journal: Take time each day to write down three things you are grateful for. This can help shift your focus away from what others are doing and towards the positive aspects of your own life.

Use a productivity planner: Having a clear plan for your day can help you stay on track and feel more in control of your tasks. This can reduce feelings of jealousy and help you focus on your own progress.

Practice mindfulness: Mindfulness can help you stay present and focused on the task at hand. Take a few minutes each day to sit quietly and focus on your breath. This can help reduce feelings of jealousy and increase feelings of contentment.
Find a mentor: Seek out someone who has achieved success in your field and learn from them. This can help you gain perspective and focus on your own progress rather than comparing yourself to others.
Start a side hustle: Consider starting a side hustle or freelance work. This can give you a sense of accomplishment and help you feel more in control of your own success.
